name: DEXTER-MD
description: An easy and simple WhatsApp bot developed by DEXTER

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: ඔයාට Auto status seen වෙන්න ඔන නම් yes දෙන්න නැතම් No

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be download automatically and send to you(type yes to active or no to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

PM_PERMIT.description: Other user can't use your bot in pm (type yes to active or no to deactive ; don't write in capital letter)

BOT_NAME.description: put A name for your bot

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: add one or many link for your bot menu  ; eg : url1,url2,url3.....

PUBLIC_MODE.description: type yes to put your bot on public mode or no to put it on private mod

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: insert your heroku api-key (this is optionnal)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: insert your heroku APP NAME (this is optionnal)

SESSION_ID.description: ඔයාගෙ session id එක දෙන්න ► eyJub2I...

OWNER_NUMBER.desc: ඔයගේ whatsapp number එක ගහන්න (exemple of togo '94')

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: if you don't want startting-bot-message put no else put yes
